thread.title: Actor Randy Quaid, wife to be arraigned in Vermont
thread.title_full: Actor Randy Quaid, wife to be arraigned in Vermont

title: Actor Randy Quaid, wife to be arraigned in Vermont
text:
Actor Randy Quaid, wife to be arraigned in Vermont Pair arrested crossing Canadian border UPDATED 11:31 AM EDT Oct 12, 2015 A Large Text Photos 
Oscar nominee and Golden Globe winner Randy Quaid will be in a Vermont courtroom Monday afternoon with his wife, Evgenia. More 
The two are scheduled to be arraigned at 1 p.m. in St. Albans. 
The Quaids were stopped on Friday in West Berkshire for trying to cross the border from Canada with active warrants. 
The couple is wanted in California. The state district attorney's office said the Quaids have been fugitives since 2010 on charges of felony vandalism, misdemeanor trespass and failure to appear while out on bail. 
The arraignment in Vermont state court was the first step in the extradition process. 
The Santa Barbara County Sheriff's Office and the DA's office said they intend for the couple, either voluntarily or by warrant, to also be arraigned in the state of California. 
WPTZ NewsChannel 5 will be in court covering the arraignment. WPTZ.com plans to stream the arraignment live online.
